schema.name: public
schema.object-types: constraint, view, column, dataset trigger, table, function

connection.console:
select pt."name", cost_value, sale_value from ( select pol.product_id as product_id, sum(pol.purchase_price * qty) as cost_value, sum(pol.price_unit * qty) as sale_value from pos_order_line as pol left join pos_order as po on pol.order_id = po.id left join pos_session as ps on po.session_id = ps.id where po.state in ('paid', 'done', 'invoiced') and po.location_id = 18 and date_trunc('day',po.date_order) >= '2019-04-13' and date_trunc('day',po.date_order) <= '2019-04-23' group by pol.product_id ) tbl_line inner join product_product as pp on tbl_line.product_id = pp.id inner join product_template as pt on pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id
select pol.product_id, pol.purchase_price, pol.qty, pol.price_unit from pos_order_line as pol left join pos_order as po on pol.order_id = po.id left join pos_session as ps on po.session_id = ps.id where po.state in ('paid', 'done', 'invoiced') and po.location_id = 18 and date_trunc('day',po.date_order) >= '2019-04-13' and date_trunc('day',po.date_order) <= '2019-04-23' and pol.product_id = 22188;
select pt.name as product_name, pol.product_id, sum(purchase_price * qty) as product_purchase_price, sum(price_unit * qty) as sell_price from pos_order_line as pol left join pos_order as po on pol.order_id = po.id left join pos_session as ps on po.session_id = ps.id left join product_product as pp on pol.product_id = pp.id left join product_template as pt on pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id where po.state in ('paid', 'done', 'invoiced') and po.location_id = 18 and date_trunc('day',po.date_order) >= 'Apr 13, 2019, 3:24:24 PM' and date_trunc('day',po.date_order) <= 'Apr 23, 2019, 3:24:24 PM' and ps.config_id = 9 group by product_id, pt.name order by product_purchase_price asc;
select pt.name as product_name,pp.barcode,pc.name as category, sq.qty, (sq.qty*ip.value_float) as cost_price,pu.name as uom from stock_quant sq left join ir_property ip on (ip.name = 'standard_price' and ip.res_id = concat('product.product,',sq .product_id)) left join product_product pp on(sq.product_id=pp.id) left join product_template pt on(pp.product_tmpl_id=pt.id) left join product_category pc on(pt.categ_id=pc.id) left join product_uom pu on(pt.uom_id=pu.id) where sq.location_id=18 order by pc.name
select pt.name as product_name, pp.barcode as barcode, pc.name as category, sq.qty as qty, COALESCE(ip.value_float,0) as cost_price, pu.name as uom, COALESCE((sq.qty*ip.value_float),0) as Total_cost_price from stock_quant as sq left join ir_property ip on (ip.name = 'standard_price' and ip.res_id = concat('product.product,',sq.product_id)) left join product_product as pp on sq.product_id=pp.id left join product_template as pt on pp.product_tmpl_id=pt.id left join product_category as pc on pt.categ_id=pc.id left join product_uom as pu on pt.uom_id=pu.id where -- sq.location_id= and sq.product_id = 22531 group by sq.product_id,pt."name",pp.barcode,pc."name",sq.qty,ip.value_float,pu."name" order by pc.name
select from ( select sum(sq.qty), max(COALESCE(ip.value_float,0)) as cost_price, sum(COALESCE((sq.qty*ip.value_float),0)) as Total_cost_price from stock_quant as sq left join ir_property ip on (ip.name = 'standard_price' and ip.res_id = concat('product.product,',sq.product_id)) where sq.product_id = 22531 group by sq.product_id) as tbl1 left join product_product as pp on sq.product_id=pp.id left join product_template as pt on pp.product_tmpl_id=pt.id left join product_category as pc on pt.categ_id=pc.id left join product_uom as pu on pt.uom_id=pu.id where -- sq.location_id=3 and sq.product_id = 22531 order by pc.name
select sq.qty, max(COALESCE(ip.value_float,0)) as cost_price, sum(COALESCE((sq.qty*ip.value_float),0)) as Total_cost_price from stock_quant as sq left join ir_property ip on (ip.name = 'standard_price' and ip.res_id = concat('product.product,',sq.product_id)) where sq.product_id = 22531 group by sq.product_id
select sl.id, sl.name from (select distinct sq.location_id as location from stock_quant as sq)tbl1 inner join stock_location as sl on tbl1.location = sl.id;
select * from product_template where id = 10442; select standard_price from product_product; select * from product_product where id = 10442;
select * from ir_property where name = 'standard_price'; select * from product_uom; select id, name from stock_location
select sl.id, sl.name from stock_location as sl inner join stock_quant
select pt.name as Product_name, pp.barcode as Barcode, pc.name as Category, tbl2.qty, pu.name as UOM, tbl2.cost_price, tbl2.total_cost_price from( select tbl1.productID, sum(tbl1.qty) as qty, MAX(tbl1.cost_price) as cost_price, sum(tbl1.total_cost_price) as total_cost_price from( select sq.product_id as productID, sq.qty, COALESCE(ip.value_float,0) as cost_price, COALESCE((sq.qty*ip.value_float),0) as total_cost_price from stock_quant as sq left join ir_property as ip on (ip.name = 'standard_price' and ip.res_id = concat('product.product,',sq.product_id)) where sq.location_id in (18, 15) -- where sq.product_id=22531 ) as tbl1 group by tbl1.productID) tbl2 left join product_product as pp on tbl2.productID=pp.id left join product_template as pt on pp.product_tmpl_id=pt.id left join product_category as pc on pt.categ_id=pc.id left join product_uom as pu on pt.uom_id=pu.id
order by pc.name ;
select pt.name as Product_name, pp.barcode as Barcode, pc.name as Category, tbl2.qty, pu.name as UOM, tbl2.cost_price, tbl2.total_cost_price from (select tbl1.productID, sum(tbl1.quant) as qty, MAX(tbl1.cost_price) as cost_price, sum(tbl1.total_cost_price) as total_cost_price from (select sq.product_id as productID, sum(sq.qty) as quant, max(COALESCE(ip.value_float,0)) as cost_price, sum(round(COALESCE((sq.qty*ip.value_float),0))) as total_cost_price from stock_quant as sq left join ir_property as ip on (ip.name = 'standard_price' and ip.res_id = concat('product.product,',sq.product_id)) where sq.cost = 0 and sq.location_id in (18, 15) group by sq.product_id
UNION ALL
select sq.product_id as productID, sum(sq.qty) as quant, max(COALESCE(sq.cost,0)) as cost_price, sum(round(COALESCE((sq.qty*sq.cost),0))) as total_cost_price from stock_quant as sq where sq.cost != 0 and sq.location_id in (18, 15) group by sq.product_id ) tbl1 group by tbl1.productID) tbl2 left join product_product as pp on tbl2.productID=pp.id left join product_template as pt on pp.product_tmpl_id=pt.id left join product_category as pc on pt.categ_id=pc.id left join product_uom as pu on pt.uom_id=pu.id
order by pc.name
select * from audit_log
select * from hr_payslip_worked_days select * from hr_payslip

SELECT pt.name AS Product_name, pp.barcode AS Barcode, pc.name AS Category, tbl2.qty, pu.name AS UOM, tbl2.cost_price, tbl2.total_cost_price FROM (SELECT tbl1.productID, sum(tbl1.qty) AS qty, MAX(tbl1.cost_price) AS cost_price, sum(tbl1.total_cost_price) AS total_cost_price FROM (SELECT sq.product_id AS productID, sq.qty, COALESCE(ip.value_float, 0) AS cost_price, COALESCE((sq.qty*ip.value_float),0) AS total_cost_price FROM stock_quant AS sq LEFT JOIN ir_property AS ip ON (ip.name = 'standard_price' AND ip.res_id = concat('product.product,', sq.product_id) ) WHERE sq.location_id IN (18) -- AND pt.categ_id IN (626, 625, 624, 632, 633, 620, 623, 629, 525, 630, 611, 627, 631, 353, 622, 621, 628, 608, 537) ) AS tbl1 GROUP BY tbl1.productID) tbl2 LEFT JOIN product_product AS pp ON tbl2.productID=pp.id LEFT JOIN product_template AS pt ON pp.product_tmpl_id=pt.id LEFT JOIN product_category AS pc ON pt.categ_id=pc.id LEFT JOIN product_uom AS pu ON pt.uom_id=pu.id WHERE pt.categ_id IN (626, 625, 624, 632, 633, 620, 623, 629, 525, 630, 611, 627, 631, 353, 622, 621, 628, 608, 537) ORDER BY pc.name ;
SELECT pt.name AS Product_name, pp.barcode AS Barcode, pc.name AS Category, tbl2.qty, pu.name AS UOM, tbl2.cost_price, tbl2.total_cost_price FROM (SELECT tbl1.productID, sum(tbl1.quant) AS qty, MAX(tbl1.cost_price) AS cost_price, sum(tbl1.total_cost_price) AS total_cost_price FROM (SELECT sq.product_id AS productID, sum(sq.qty) AS quant, max(COALESCE(ip.value_float, 0)) AS cost_price, sum(round(COALESCE((sq.qty*ip.value_float),0))) AS total_cost_price FROM stock_quant AS sq LEFT JOIN ir_property AS ip ON (ip.name = 'standard_price' AND ip.res_id = concat('product.product,', sq.product_id)) WHERE sq.cost = 0 AND sq.location_id IN (15, 18) GROUP BY sq.product_id
UNION ALL
SELECT sq.product_id AS productID, sum(sq.qty) AS quant, max(COALESCE(sq.cost, 0)) AS cost_price, sum(round(COALESCE((sq.qty*sq.cost),0))) AS total_cost_price FROM stock_quant AS sq WHERE sq.cost != 0 AND sq.location_id IN (15, 18) GROUP BY sq.product_id ) tbl1 GROUP BY tbl1.productID) tbl2 LEFT JOIN product_product AS pp ON tbl2.productID=pp.id LEFT JOIN product_template AS pt ON pp.product_tmpl_id=pt.id LEFT JOIN product_category AS pc ON pt.categ_id=pc.id LEFT JOIN product_uom AS pu ON pt.uom_id=pu.id WHERE pt.categ_id IN (626, 625, 624, 632, 633, 620, 623, 629, 525, 630, 611, 627, 631, 353, 622, 621, 628, 608, 537) ORDER BY pc.name

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(product_qty_in - product_qty_out),0) AS qty_in_opn, COALESCE(SUM(value_in - value_out),0) AS value_in_opn FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN pt.article_prod_type='footwear' THEN sum(sm.product_uom_qty) ELSE 0 END AS product_qty_in, 0 AS product_qty_out, sum(sm.product_uom_qty * sm.sale_price) AS value_in, 0 AS value_out FROM stock_move AS sm LEFT JOIN product_product AS pp ON sm.product_id = pp.id LEFT JOIN product_template AS pt ON pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id WHERE date_trunc('day',sm.date) < '2019-05-04' AND sm.state = 'done' AND sm.location_dest_id = 77 GROUP BY pt.id
UNION ALL
SELECT 0 AS product_qty_in, CASE WHEN pt.article_prod_type='footwear' THEN sum(sm.product_uom_qty) ELSE 0 END AS product_qty_out, 0 AS value_in, sum(sm.product_uom_qty * sm.sale_price) AS value_out FROM stock_move AS sm LEFT JOIN product_product AS pp ON sm.product_id = pp.id LEFT JOIN product_template AS pt ON pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id WHERE date_trunc('day',sm.date) <'2019-05-04' AND sm.state = 'done' AND sm.location_id = 77 GROUP BY pt.id ) tbl_open
